description: This file defines a class PandasTools that provides utility methods for creating and manipulating pandas DataFrames within a toolkit framework. It includes methods for creating DataFrames from various sources and performing operations like head and tail, with logging and error handling.

classes.name: PandasTools
classes.description: A toolkit class that manages pandas DataFrames, allowing creation and operations on them.

methods.name: create_pandas_dataframe
methods.description: Creates a pandas DataFrame from a specified function and parameters, returning the DataFrame name or an error message.

methods.name: run_dataframe_operation
methods.description: Performs an operation (like head or tail) on a specified DataFrame and returns the result as a string or an error message.
